channel.title: Need big help plz!
channel.description:
hey peeps need help with all this i am new to this and i really need ur help,
1st : i have followed all the steps to adding items to my client and when i do add model it says it was succesful, but when i spawn the item it says null?? btw when i comlpile it says 17 errors .... Finished!
2nd : how do i add like 2 things to edit in the metaseq? like godsword handles with d scim blades or so on??
3rd : how do i get the new mdls? like god swords or sc?
thnx and i hope you can help me even the slitest thing mite help =]
oh and how do i make the drop models =]

item.title: Need big help plz!
item.dc:creator: @strengthpk strengthpk
item.description:
@strengthpk wrote:

add it to your models folder and then add the ints into your class.8 folder client sided… compile… go to server folder add the id # into your item folder under chestplate cat. whatever it is… and it will be unglitched… note* if you want a different id for it go to class 8 and then go to where it has the id # and just change it i recommend chaning it to 9999 and down… much easier… especially if it’s dodain idk why it’s easier but it is… and there yeah go.

Read full topic

item.title: Need big help plz!
item.dc:creator: @Master_184 Master 184
item.description:
@Master_184 wrote:

? emm ok[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 02, 2008, 12:36:27 pm[/size][hr]i was looking at your d plate how do u get the definition and templates for it ?? cuz i want to make a personel cape or d plate but i dont know how to get the templates?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 02, 2008, 12:48:37 pm[/size][hr]ffs im annoyed now i do add model and everything but it says null! plz help me!

item.title: Need big help plz!
item.dc:creator: @slyf1 slyf1
item.description:
@slyf1 wrote:

well thne yull need to to copy and paste it go open the 1 that wont upen and open it n mqo then dellet all object on it you dont want on your new 1 then hit select all then to edit and hit copy then go to the the other 1 and hit paste then it should work

item.title: Need big help plz!
item.dc:creator: @Master_184 Master 184
item.description:
@Master_184 wrote:

oh ok u been big help and i did gz them ( do u mean 7zipped? ) and btw wat u mean by “open one of the 2 models.> to the insert model 1 inch underneath attribe in the top pannal” becuz i cant open them they got that weird icon … but thnx

Read full topic

item.title: Need big help plz!
item.dc:creator: @slyf1 slyf1
item.description:
@slyf1 wrote:

  1. did you .gz them
  2. is easy open one of the 2 models.> to the insert model 1 inch underneath attribe in the top pannal
  3. download a client that seems to have what your looking for or use the 1 you already have then > models> then un .gz them and up then the folder then go to the model veiwer find the folder you just opened and click on the icon it will be like 18343 or any other number then go to > export> .mqo
  4. just rotate it till its lieing on its side then move it to the bottom and save it as (item name) drop model

Read full topic
